item.description:
UPDATE:  Had to change the date due to a personal conflict.  Hope everyone can still make it on Tuesday, March 20

 

Well fellow winos, the end of our Italian odyssey is in sight.  Join us as Noelle leads us on a hop from the Italian mainland to the islands of Sicilia, Sardegna, & others.  Don't worry, we won't retrace the fatal cruise of the Costa Concordia (sorry, too soon?).

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Italy Tour Finale: The Islands
